extendedInfo.description: The Material Estimator calculator for your Android smartphone is built with the same features and functions, and the same core engine that powers the industry-standard advanced construction-math calculators from Calculated Industries. No learning curve -- just one powerful, easy-to-use calculator app with material solutions for gravel, fences, blocks, flooring, tile, paint, decking and moreHow much? How many? Quickly estimate cost and quantity â get EXACTLY what you need.â¢ Answers the questions you ask on the job every day: How many do I need? How much will it cost? â¢ Built-in answers for materials and spacingâ¢ Get exactly what you need with built-in function keys and cost and percent functionsâ¢ Save time and money by eliminating estimating errorsâ¢ Convert between all standard building math dimensionsIdeal for contractors, trades people and estimating professionals who need to estimate materials and costs for concrete, fences, decks, bricks, tile, flooring, gravel, painting, drywall and paneling and more. Built-in functions help you instantly calculate:â Tile, Custom Tiles, Flooring, Drywall and Panelingâ Decks, Fencing, Studs and On-center Spacingâ Concrete, Blocks and Bricksâ Paintâ GravelFEATURES:â Created by Calculated Industries, the originator of the award-winning Construction MasterÂ® calculators.â Built-in help â just press and hold the desired key for full, clear definitions, explanations and examples of keystrokes.â Easily calculate material costs and allowances using cost and percent (%) functions.â Store coverage areas and spacing to instantly get accurate material estimates for your jobs and projects.â Full dimensional calculator for all your linear, square area or cubic volume calculation needs.Time-saving Utilities Includeâ Works directly in Feet, Inches, Fractions, Yards and Meters â including square and cubic formats. No need to convert to decimals.â Quickly and accurately calculate material requirements for Studs, 4x8, 4x9, 4x10, 4x12 Sheets, Board Feet, Floor Tiles, Blocks, Bricks, Gravel, and Paint.â Board Feet and Cost per Unit functions calculate material cost estimates instantly.Special Functionsâ Entry Editing Backspace Key â with a swipe of a fingerâ Haptic Feedback (optional)â Cost per Unit: Solve unit cost and pricingâ Paperless Tapeâ Memory Functionâ User-Definable Preferences â set custom options: Fractions, Area, Volume.Great solution for anyone needing material estimates such as: tile, paint, flooring, blocks, gravel, fences, decks and more.

reviews.title: Good if you can\'t count
reviews.comment: Functions are simple, but many building materials aren\'t supported.  Materials which are easy to figure out out doors for you, but complex materials aren\'t even supported.  No siding at all supported, quote useless if your in the trades.  Might be useful if you have no clue what you\'re doing...
reviews.author: Jamie Pate

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Awesome- just wish there was place for notes....
reviews.author: jase Stolz

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I use it for work replacing the one I used for work...one less thing in my pocket. I wish the buttons had a touch more feedback..but love it anyways...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Once you get the hang of it, you see how handy it is
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Calc Apps
reviews.comment: Full screen option doesn\'t work with this app, CM Pro works fine not this one plz fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shortcut
reviews.comment: The app is great i have the actual calculator at home bit this works great in the field. The shortcut always vanishes though and i have to look through all apps to find it. Fix this bug!
reviews.author: Josh Amato
